text:
Hi tom sorry again for my slowness!! I felt that the bookcase was a great way to introduce the symptoms of dementia for someone who is unfamiliar with it. You could represent someone's memories and life story via books and ornaments on the shelves and have them fall off. It's something you could refer back to throughout the movie. But that's just my take. You have a better handle on this than me.

Do you have any further work to look at?
